title: Web Scraping from realtor.com and constructing a relational database
snippet: Looking for an expert in web scraping and make the data neat as a relational database. I am looking at http://www.realtor.com/soldhomeprices/Middlesex-County_MA. I need an expert who can construct a dataset that has property-level information and the detailed information on each property, in particular, the sales history of each property.
